data.eml:eml: Lost and found: Alopecosa krynickii (Araneae: Lycosidae) in the Crimea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nadolny, Anton A. (2018): Lost and found: Alopecosa krynickii (Araneae: Lycosidae) in the Crimea. Zootaxa 4394 (4): 594-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4394.4.11
